name: Corruption Fighters
title: Strong Anti-Corruption Measures
description: Ghana has a robust anti-corruption framework with 15 sources contributing to the control of corruption in 2023, showcasing a strong commitment to transparency and accountability.

name: Tax Relief
title: Negative Tax Burden
description: In 2022, Ghana's other taxes were recorded at -4.26% of revenue, indicating a unique fiscal situation that may provide relief to businesses and individuals.

name: Effective Governance
title: High Government Effectiveness
description: With 13 sources supporting government effectiveness and a low standard error of 0.197 in 2023, Ghana demonstrates efficient governance and public service delivery.

name: Business Ready
title: Top Business Location Regulations
description: Ghana scored 87.58 in the quality of regulations for business locations in 2024, making it an attractive destination for businesses seeking regulatory clarity.

name: Labor Efficiency
title: Efficient Labor Regulations
description: In 2024, Ghana achieved a score of 91.08 in operational efficiency of labor regulations, reflecting a conducive environment for workforce management.

name: Safety Net Champions
title: Strong Social Safety Net
description: In 2016, 57.56% of social safety net benefits were directed to the poorest quintile, highlighting Ghana's commitment to social equity.

name: Rule of Law Advocates
title: Robust Rule of Law Framework
description: With 16 sources supporting the rule of law and a low standard error of 0.139 in 2023, Ghana upholds a strong legal framework and justice system.

name: Regulatory Prowess
title: High Regulatory Quality
description: Ghana's regulatory quality is supported by 12 sources with a low standard error of 0.169 in 2023, ensuring effective policy implementation.

name: Voice of the People
title: Strong Voice and Accountability
description: In 2023, Ghana's voice and accountability were supported by 14 sources, reflecting a vibrant democratic environment.
